name: LUCID (itch) (FRI, iql.dnr, Ur Boo, eve130, Eunoiala)
name_original: LUCID (itch) (FRI, iql.dnr, Ur Boo, eve130, Eunoiala)
description:
Lucid by Eve

Lucid is a black and white game that has simple gameplay about a character's journey that begins with the emergence of life, which is accompanied by the emergence of obstacles that the character must pass to reach the end of his journey.

Lucid is a short platformer game about a person running from death in a mysterious place. Find your way across the mysterious forest and temple and reach the conclusion as to where you are, and how to get out of there.

Beware of traps and other things that will impede your journey. Use crates and carts to reach higher places and proceed to the goal.

This game was made during BGDJam and was inspired by some games like limbo. This game itself was made using Photoshop, spritepro, unity, adobexd, and others.
